definition: to distribute/distribution/to assign (sb) to a job

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: You must ensure that messages are redistributed correctly.
sentences.chinese: 您必须确保消息被正确地重新分发。

sentences.english: More than 550 priests were on hand to distribute  communion to the participants.
sentences.chinese: 有550多个祭司当时在那里给神父在分发圣餐。

sentences.english: You are free to distribute the viewer and to incorporate the library in your product.
sentences.chinese: 你可以自由分发观众，并把你的产品在库。

sentences.english: Allowing or disallowing a message to be delivered based on some conditional logic in the mediation.
sentences.chinese: 基于中介中一些条件逻辑允许或禁止消息的分发。

sentences.english: We've been out papering the city with flyers.
sentences.chinese: 我们用飞机在城市内分发赠券。

sentences.english: The intelligence report is understood to have been issued to European navies.
sentences.chinese: 据悉，这份情报报告已经被分发到欧洲各国海军。

sentences.english: Here, suggestions to maximize the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 下面，我给您提出一些使家长会充分发挥作用的建议。

sentences.english: They played together for an hour, and then Pauls mother gave them some food;
sentences.chinese: 这里保罗的母亲给他们分发食品。

sentences.english: He dished out our pay in silver dollars.
sentences.chinese: 他以银元分发我们的工资。

sentences.english: However, the published material is being distributed without warranty of any kind, either express of implied.
sentences.chinese: 但是，已出版材料的分发无任何明确或含蓄的保证。

sentences.english: We also circulated an overview paper.
sentences.chinese: 我们还分发了一份概述文件。

sentences.english: The software distribution job sends the software to targeted devices.
sentences.chinese: 该软件分发作业将软件发送给目标设备。

sentences.english: Once the cads are dealt, I'm looking for specific behaviors that represent meaningful tells.
sentences.chinese: 扑克牌分发之后，注意那些意味深长的特别行为。

sentences.english: We introduce E91 quantum key distribution scheme, which is based on EPR pair.
sentences.chinese: 首先介绍了基于EPR对的E91量子密钥分发方案。

definition: to wrap/to pack/to put leftovers in a doggy bag for take-out/to package (computing)
to come together (to form sth)/to assemble together/(chemistry) to polymerize
to issue/to distribute/to publish along with
to distribute/to assign/to allocate/to partition (a hard drive)
to store up/to stockpile/(computer) to save/to store/memory/storage
